funding-group.funding-statement: All the authors of this paper are jointly funded under the Development Corridors Partnership (DCP) project. The DCP is a UK Research and Innovation’s Global Challenges Research Fund (GCRF) funded project (project number: ES/P011500/1). The DCP aims to generate decision-relevant evidence and feeding into key decision-making processes in order to improve the sustainable development outcomes and investments in infrastructure projects.
